message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs. Considering its value and the benefits it provides, we're offering it to you for $1500000. This special price is exclusive to you and reflects our commitment to ensuring you receive the best possible solution. We believe this investment will pay off in numerous ways for you.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and my budget.

Thank you for your prompt response, Bob. We understand your position and would like to offer a compromise. Considering the value of the product and your budget, we are willing to negotiate at $1350000. This is still a premium price, reflecting the quality and benefits of our product, while being more accessible to you.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above $1350000. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $1200000, which is the maximum I'm willing to pay. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and my budget.

We appreciate your continued interest in our product, Bob. After careful consideration, we are prepared to offer the product to you for $1300000. This price reflects the value and quality of the product, while also providing a reasonable margin for us. We believe this offer strikes a good balance between our interests and yours.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further, Alice. I'm still a bit above $1300000, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $1250000. I believe this price is fair and reasonable, and I'm hoping we can come to an agreement.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. We understand your position and are willing to consider a price closer to your suggested amount. Therefore, we propose a final offer of $1280000 for the product. This price still maintains a reasonable margin for us while being more accessible to you.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $1240000. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement at this price.

Thank you for your final offer, Bob. We appreciate your effort to reach an agreement. In light of this, we are willing to accept $1260000 as the final price for the product. This allows us to maintain a satisfactory margin while still making the product accessible to you.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm willing to go up to $1220000, but that's my absolute limit. I hope we can meet at this price and finalize the deal.
